src:
Hasil Pertandingan Crystal Palace vs Leicester City: Skor 0-2
03 Nov 2019, 22:57 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Leicester City sukses mengalahkan Crystal Palace dua gol tanpa balas dalam laga lanjutan Premier League 2019-20 pekan ke-11 yang dihelat di Selhurst Park, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Dua gol kemenangan Leicester seluruhnya tercipta pada babak kedua, masing-masing lewat aksi Caglar Soyuncu dan Jamie Vardy.
Berkat hasil ini, Leicester kembali ke peringkat tiga klasemen dengan perolehan poin 23, sedangkan Crystal Palace tertahan di posisi kesembilan dengan poin 15.

Simak ulasan pertandingan selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Match results Crystal Palace vs Leicester City: Score 0-2
Nov 3 2019, 22:57 by Bola.net
Soccer - Leicester City successfully defeated Crystal Palace two goals without reply in the continued match of the Premier League 2019-20 Week 11 held at Selhurst Park on Sunday (3/11/2019).
Leicester's two winning goals were all created in the second half, each through the actions of Caglar Soyuncu and Jamie Vardy.
Thanks to these results, Leicester returned to third place in the standings with 23 points, while Crystal Palace stuck in ninth position with 15 points.

Check out the full match review below.
